<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinctive Obfuscation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1421) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat

**Trigger**
You are attacked by a foe.

</column>

---

The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats. You gain the effects of [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) but with two images instead of three. The tradition of this action matches the tradition of your gnome ancestry options.
name: Instinctive Obfuscation
prerequisite: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
